about.summary: Tools to using fonts other than the standard PostScript fonts. This package makes it easy to use system TrueType fonts and with PDF or PostScript output files, and with bitmap output files in Windows. extrafont can also be used with fonts packaged specifically to be used with, such as the fontcm package, which has Computer Modern PostScript fonts with math symbols. See https://github.com/wch/extrafont for instructions and examples.

Tools to using fonts other than the standard PostScript fonts. This package makes it easy to use system TrueType fonts and with PDF or PostScript output files, and with bitmap output files in Windows. extrafont can also be used with fonts packaged specifically to be used with, such as the fontcm package, which has Computer Modern PostScript fonts with math symbols. See https://github.com/wch/extrafont for instructions and examples.

name: r-extrafont
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.19" %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-extrafont
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: extrafont_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/extrafont_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/extrafont/extrafont_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 4e8f90152df13fc5dee573222a26b4d66553493fdf6af1c7777e59521ccdab8d

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 1

  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - r-base
    - r-rttf2pt1
    - r-extrafontdb

  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rttf2pt1
    - r-extrafontdb

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('extrafont')"  # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('extrafont')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/wch/extrafont
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Tools to using fonts other than the standard PostScript fonts. This package makes it easy to use system TrueType fonts and with PDF or PostScript output files, and with bitmap output files in Windows. extrafont can also be used with fonts packaged specifically to be used with, such as the fontcm package, which
    has Computer Modern PostScript fonts with math symbols. See https://github.com/wch/extrafont for instructions and examples.
  license_family: GPL2

  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - johanneskoester
    - bgruening
    - daler
